sentences.en: Comparison of building height has become the synonym of urban wealth competition.
sentences.cn: 攀比建筑的高度已经成为攀比城市财富的同义词.

sentences.en: Guessing word from Synonym and Antonym.
sentences.cn: 通过同义词和反义词的关系猜词.

sentences.en: I told people activity last longer – synonym lengthen, continuous exercise was essential.
sentences.cn: 我告诉人们,延长 、 连续的锻炼是不可或缺的.

sentences.en: In computer programming, synonym for procedure.
sentences.cn: 在计算机程序设计中同procedure(过程).

sentences.en: It is usually used as a synonym for Free Software.
sentences.cn: 它通常是自由软件的同义词.

sentences.en: Just as Rutherford ( 1987 ) said: GT was almost the synonym of FLT.
sentences.cn: 正如Rutherford ( 1987 ) 所指出的: 两千五百年来,语法教学几乎是外语教学的同义词.

sentences.en: Molly: Two of them are language dictionaries, one a synonym thesaurus.
sentences.cn: 莫莉: 两本是字典, 另一本是同义词典.

sentences.en: Now, YCL is being tagged as a synonym of terror.
sentences.cn: 现在, 共青团又被诬蔑为恐怖的代名词.

sentences.en: Occasionally used as a synonym for acidic.
Patch - up: Assembling negatives to form a composite image . Synonym with Film make - up .
sentences.cn: 拼大版: 把多张菲林负片或 正片 组合为一的情况.

sentences.en: Pax has been treated as a synonym of A.
Shows the name of the schema to which this synonym belongs.
sentences.cn: 显示选定同义词所属的架构的名称.

sentences.en: The colour is used as a synonym for environmentalism.
sentences.cn: 这种颜色已经成了环境保护论的同义词.

sentences.en: The term "industrial democracy" is often used as a synonym for worker participation.
sentences.cn: “工业民主”这一词语常被用作“工人参与”的同义词。

sentences.en: We should pay attention to the differentiation synonym.
sentences.cn: 我们应注意对同义词的辨析.

sentences.en: Zhuge Liang is a synonym for wisdom in folklore.
sentences.cn: 诸葛亮在民间传说中成了智慧的代名词.

words.tran_cn: 同义的；同义词的；同义突变的

trans.tran_en: a word with the same meaning as another word in the same language
